title: Sharing Emily
description: "Never in my wildest dreams did I think I would be doing this!" Shy, but beautiful Emily is absolutely beside herself when her husband Luke's hot friend from university in Italy - tall, dark and handsome Marcello - comes to visit them in the States. The trio venturing out for a weekend of camping in the Rocky Mountains proves to be more of an adventure than she has ever had. Believing she had been successfully keeping her lusty desires for Marcello to herself, Emily is pleasantly astonished when Luke surprises her by fulfilling her secret fantasy of being taken by two men simultaneously. After willing herself to relax, Emily experiences a titillating sense of loss of inhibition, allowing the unbelievable pleasure to overtake her, leading to the hottest night of her life! What more could a nice girl hope for?
